Me.name: Humberto Gabriel LÃ³pez Trigueros
Me.biographyContent: I am a 26-year-old born in Mairena del Alcor, a town in Seville. Since I was young, I have been fascinated by technology and how it works.
Me.biographyContent2: Together with my father, I used to play with small electronics experiments and build models controlled by radio control. Later, I ventured into programming with tools like Scratch and blogs on Blogger, where I would manually modify the code or add widgets.
Me.biographyContent3: I decided to study programming while also pursuing another of my passions, music, at the Professional Conservatory of Music in Seville. There, I learned the foundations and concepts of object-oriented programming, cross-platform languages, and their applications. I was also fortunate to share this stage with highly skilled classmates, many of whom are now working in software development.
Me.biographyContent4: After completing my studies, I continued developing my skills both in companies and on my own. I have been able to develop projects from the start through to the final deployment stage, using various technologies and implementing features that set my projects apart.
Me.biographyContent5: Today, I remain motivated to keep learning, not only in software development but also in other areas that allow me to acquire skills I can use in my work, such as video editing, 3D modeling with Blender and other programs, photography, and music. In these disciplines, I find an unending drive to keep learning and growing in all aspects.
